title: Change in goals of French Rev groups

content.question:
Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time for this question is 30 minutes. You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning your answer in the area below.

Identify the major social groups in France on the eve of the 1789 Revolution. Assess the extent to which their aspirations were achieved in the period from the meeting of the Estates-General (May 1789) to the declaration of the republic (September 1792).

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
